Extensions/Process.html#/s:So7ProcessC13.name: cancel()
Extensions/Process.html#/s:So7ProcessC13.abstract: Sends an interrupt signal to the process

Extensions/Process.html#/s:So7ProcessC13.name: isCancelled
Extensions/Process.html#/s:So7ProcessC13.abstract: true if the Process was successfully interrupted, false otherwise

Extensions/Process.html#/s:So7ProcessC13.name: launchCC(_:)
Extensions/Process.html#/s:So7ProcessC13.abstract: Launches the receiver and resolves when it exits, or when the promise is cancelled.

Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So10URLSes.name: uploadTaskCC(_:with:from:)
Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So10URLSes.abstract: Wraps the (Data?, URLResponse?, Error?) response from URLSession.uploadTask(with:from:) as CancellablePromise<(Data,URLResponse)>

Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So10URLSes.name: uploadTaskCC(_:with:fromFile:)
Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So10URLSes.abstract: Wraps the (Data?, URLResponse?, Error?) response from URLSession.uploadTask(with:fromFile:) as CancellablePromise<(Data,URLResponse)>

Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So10URLSes.name: downloadTaskCC(_:with:to:)
Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So10URLSes.abstract: Wraps the URLSesstionDownloadTask response from URLSession.downloadTask(with:) as CancellablePromise<(URL,URLResponse)>

Extensions/URLSessionTask.html#/s:So14UR.name: isCancelled
Extensions/URLSessionTask.html#/s:So14UR.abstract: true if the URLSessionTask was successfully cancelled, false otherwise
